title.narrative: Syria - Iraq Regional Stabilisation Programme (2016-2018), engagement

description.narrative: Part of the Syria Iraq Regional Stabilisation Programme 2016-2018 under the the thematic area 1: Political dialogue and peace building

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

description.narrative: FL §06.32.08.80 Global Framework for Integrated Stabilisation Efforts (development assistance)

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation

title.narrative: Preparatory work towards an archive of community narratives related to violations of human rights is conducted.

description.narrative: 1. # of consultations and dissemination workshops carried out on two TJ reports by UNDP 2. # of oral histories collected from vulnerable groups (disaggregated by gender) 3. # of people participating in local documentation initiatives (disaggregated by gender) 4. # of Circulation and dissemination of oral histories 5. # of MOLSA social workers trained 6. # of victim cases handled by MOLSA after training 7. # of victims receiving psycho-social support 8. # of victims receiving legal aid

title.narrative: Active networks of Local Peace Committees are established.

description.narrative: 1. # of new LPCs created and capacitated 2. Social Cohesion measurement tool developed 3. # of communities where Social Cohesion tool is implemented

title.narrative: Active networks of Local Peace Committees are established.

description.narrative: 1. # of new LPCs created and capacitated 2. Social Cohesion measurement tool developed 3. # of communities where Social Cohesion tool is implemented

comment.narrative: • Twenty LPCs established under FFIS project. In, Ninewah, Salahaldin, Anbar, Kirkuk, Basra, Najaf, Karbala, Baghdad, Erbil, Dohuk, Sulaimaniyah. Those LPCs are not functional. • Social cohesion measurement tool has not been developed • Coordination is largely lacking; reconciliation activities are ad hoc and piece meal

title.narrative: Awareness campaigns to inform target communities of reconciliation and transitional justice are designed and carried out

description.narrative: 1. # of videos produced as campaign material 2. # of views/hits/responses elicited by campaign material 3. % increase in individuals who believe reconciliation can be achieved 4. # of tweets, hits, likes and selected other indicators of social media impact

title.narrative: Partners conduct joint preparatory work towards the establishment of a comprehensive victim support programme

description.narrative: A comprehensive victim support programme for Iraq is implemented

title.narrative: Partners conduct joint preparatory work towards the establishment of a comprehensive victim support programme

description.narrative: A comprehensive victim support programme for Iraq is implemented

comment.narrative: No systematic or comprehensive support programme for victims of GHVs exists in Iraq whether for documentation, psycho-social support, legal aid or compensation

title.narrative: Enhanced social cohesion in targeted communities and regions, as well as higher levels of trust between these communities/regions and the national leadership in Baghdad.

description.narrative: • 1.1. # of community and provincial reconciliation processes established • 1.2. # of agreements signed by conflicting parties • 1.3. # of agreements implemented to satisfaction of parties • 1.4. 30% women representation; 30% youth representation, proportional minority representation; • 1.5. 15% increase in social cohesion in targeted communities per annum

title.narrative: Enhanced social cohesion in targeted communities and regions, as well as higher levels of trust between these communities/regions and the national leadership in Baghdad.

description.narrative: • 1.1. # of community and provincial reconciliation processes established • 1.2. # of agreements signed by conflicting parties • 1.3. # of agreements implemented to satisfaction of parties • 1.4. 30% women representation; 30% youth representation, proportional minority representation; • 1.5. 15% increase in social cohesion in targeted communities per annum

title.narrative: Public awareness of the needs and possibilities for reconciliation and transitional justice increase in selected areas.

description.narrative: • 2.1. Increased Public Awareness of the needs and possibilities for reconciliation and transitional justice as measured by social cohesion tool • 2.2. Increased media coverage, impact and responses

title.narrative: Public awareness of the needs and possibilities for reconciliation and transitional justice increase in selected areas.

description.narrative: • 2.1. Increased Public Awareness of the needs and possibilities for reconciliation and transitional justice as measured by social cohesion tool • 2.2. Increased media coverage, impact and responses

comment.narrative: • No public awareness campaign exists to support reconciliation at community level • No media campaign running on public media in Iraq focused on reconciliation
